--- editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- # ACO AIP Plan {#care-aip} The __Advance Investment Payment Spend Plan__ data provides payment use, spending category, projected and actual spending of advanced investments payments by __Accountable Care Organizations (ACOs)__. ### Metadata ::: {.cell}

   [MODIFIED] 2025-03-18

 [DICTIONARY] https://data.cms.gov/resources/advance-investment-payment-spend-plan-data-dictionary
